title: Morrissey - Ringleader Of The Tormentors vinylrip 24bit 48khz FL
description:
Vinyl rip from 180g new vinyl. Small amounts of surface noise.

Why 2448? Why not use 24bit 96khz instead? I\\\&#039;m using a Squeezebox and the highest rate is 24/48.

Ringleader of the Tormentors is the title of Morrissey\\\&#039;s most recent album, which debuted at number one in the UK album charts and number twenty-seven in the US. Billboard magazine described the album as showcasing \\\"a thicker, more rock-driven sound\\\"[1]; Morrissey attributes this change in sound to new guitarist Jesse Tobias. The album was released on 3 April 2006 internationally and on 4 April 2006 in North America. The album was released on the Attack Records label.


Equipment used for the rip
---------------------------

Pro-ject RPM5 turntable
Benz Micro MC pickup
Cambridge Azur 640P Phono pre-amplifier that is extensively modified
Silver cables
AD converter E-MU 0404 USB

Hope you like it.
